description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. This is a puzzle game.   Gizmo (green) and blocks (red) fall at random , well stacked,  Sometimes the water appears, it flow Gizmo. Blocks arranged in a row, it will disappear.
description.short: This is a puzzle game.   Gizmo (green) and blocks (red) fall at random , well stacked,  Sometimes the water appears, it flow Gizmo. Blocks arranged in a row, it will disappear.
